events.message: We have received your application for the software engineer position and will begin reviewing it shortly.
Your application has been categorized under Engineering roles based on your experience with software development.
A recruiter specializing in engineering hires has been assigned to your case and will reach out soon.
The initial screening call went well, and your skills in software development match our requirements closely.
You responded promptly expressing enthusiasm for the next stages of the software engineer hiring process.
We have scheduled your technical interview with our senior developer team for next Wednesday at 10 AM.
Your technical interview was completed successfully, showcasing strong problem-solving and coding skills.
An HR interview has been scheduled to discuss your alignment with company culture and benefits package.
The HR interview was completed successfully, and all your questions about the role and company were addressed.
We have sent you a formal offer for the software engineer position with competitive salary and benefits.
You provided positive feedback on the offer and asked a few clarifying questions about the onboarding process.
You have officially accepted the offer, and we are excited to welcome you to the engineering team.
Your onboarding process has started with an orientation session and setup of all engineering tools.
The hiring process is now closed successfully, and you are officially part of the software engineering team.
